Apple.description: You like juicy apples, don't you?.

Banana.description: The only fruit you deserve, like an ape.

Carrot.description: Good for your eyesight, but not for your brain, not like you have it anyways.

Worm.description: Eww, who would buy this disgusting thing? Oh wait, you probably would.

Ant.description: Even though its small, it's more efficient and useful than you.

Sand.description: Just a bunch of tiny rocks, much like your brain.

Dirt.description: Perfect for planting your non-existent brain cells.

Shovel.description: You wanna dig like cavemen, huh?

Bank Note.description: You need more bank space, huh?
